summary: Interactive romantic Valentine web page (HTML/CSS/JS) with Yes/No prompt; No button evasive on hover; Yes shows meme image message; optimized to run in Chrome on iPad.

existing_features.title: Create a single-page romantic Valentine prompt UI that asks the user (in English) to be the author’s Valentine, using a pink-and-white color scheme and a simple, centered layout optimized for iPad Chrome.
Implement two on-screen options: “Yes” and “No”. The “No” option must move away when the user attempts to interact with it so that it is effectively not clickable.
When the user clicks/taps “Yes”, replace the prompt/options with a reveal state that displays a meme image and the exact message: “That’s the best decision you’ve ever made❤️”.
Add the required generated meme image to the app as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and render it in the “Yes” reveal state.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a simple romantic-themed interactive Valentine web page (HTML/CSS/JS) with a single prompt asking to be Valentine
Provide Yes and No options; make the No button move away on hover to prevent clicking
On clicking Yes, display a meme image with the text “That’s the best decision you’ve ever made❤️”
Use pink and white romantic color scheme and styling
Ensure page runs easily in Chrome on iPad (standalone HTML/CSS/JS)
